pr_title: Validate that same dynamic filter domain is set

timeline.message:
Validate that same dynamic filter domain is set

DynamicFilterFetcher can make two subsequent requests
with same local DF version (triggered by TaskStatus
updates). In such case same DF might be received twice.

timeline.bodyText:
Change looks ok to me.
One doubt, why don't we just do taskDomains.putIfAbsent and avoid this status check ?
timeline.author: raunaqmorarka

replies.bodyText:
One doubt, why don't we just do taskDomains.putIfAbsent and avoid this status check ?

That would mean invariant that there is one version of DF is broken somewhere. We want to enforce that invariant.
replies.author: sopel39
